summary: Ensure deploy wrapper bootstraps env.php when artifact omits it

changes.description: Updates deploy-time env/config wrapper setup so Magento artifacts that do not include app/etc/env.php are still bootstrapped correctly. The agent now creates env.base.php from env.warden.php (or an empty fallback), writes wrapper env.php unconditionally, and applies wrapper setup to both php-fpm-admin and the local php-fpm storefront container to prevent frontend 500s.
